00011 #include "type_impl.h"
00012 #include "common/stack_string.h"

00014 namespace reflection
00015 {
00016 
00018 
00019         struct pointer_type::pointer_type_impl : public type::type_impl
00020         {
00021                 pointer_type_impl(type* pointee)
00022                         : type_impl(T_POINTER, ARCH_POINTER, sizeof(void*))
00023                         , m_pointee(pointee)
00024                 { }
00025 
00026                 virtual void print_name() const
00027                 {
00028                         stack_string<> buf = m_pointee->name();
00029                         *buf += '*';
00030                         set_name(buf->c_str());
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 type* m_pointee;
00034         };
00035 
00037 
00038         pointer_type::pointer_type(type* pointee)
00039                 : type(new pointer_type_impl(pointee))
00040         {
00041                 m_impl = static_cast<pointer_type_impl*>(type::m_impl);
00042         }
00043 
00045 
00046         type* pointer_type::pointee_type() const
00047         {
00048                 return m_impl->m_pointee;
00049         }
00050 
00052 
00053         bool pointer_type::equal(const type* other) const
00054         {
00055                 if(!type::equal(other))
00056                         return false;
00057                 const pointer_type* pt = static_cast<const pointer_type*>(other);
00058                 return pointee_type()->equal(pt->pointee_type());
00059         }
